summary: Auto-logout feature testing completed successfully. All 10 backend tests pass (100%). Frontend testing verified: logout button stops all timers (fulfillment + production), session timeout warning dialog UI components exist in Layout.jsx, heartbeat tracking works correctly.

issues: Minor console warning about chart dimensions - 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0'

passed_tests: All endpoints require authentication (401 without auth)
Stop-all returns 0 when no active timers
Full logout flow: stop-all timers -> logout -> redirect to login
Frontend logout button triggers both stop-all API calls
User redirected to login page after logout
critical_code_review_comments: Layout.jsx correctly implements stopAllTimers() function that calls both endpoints
Session timeout uses localStorage sessionStartTime for persistence across page refreshes
handleSessionTimeout() shows warning dialog with 60-second countdown
performLogout() correctly calls stopAllTimers() before logout
Added data-testid attributes to session timeout dialog for future automated testing
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/components/Layout.jsx (added data-testid attributes to session timeout dialog)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Auto-logout feature is fully functional. Session timeout warning dialog (9 hours) cannot be tested in real-time but UI components verified. The dialog has new data-testid attributes: session-timeout-dialog, session-countdown, session-logout-btn, session-continue-btn. All API endpoints (/api/fulfillment/timers/stop-all, /api/production/timers/stop-all, /api/activity/heartbeat) working correctly.

backend_endpoints./api/fulfillment/timers/stop-all: Working - stops all active fulfillment timers for user
backend_endpoints./api/production/timers/stop-all: Working - stops all active production timers for user

frontend_components.handleLogout(): Calls stopAllTimers() before logout, clears localStorage
frontend_components.SessionTimeoutWarning: AlertDialog with 60-second countdown, 'Continue Working' and 'Log Out Now' buttons
frontend_components.performLogout(): Stops timers, logs out, redirects to login page

integration.logout_flow: Verified - stop-all calls made before logout API call
